data.name: WARZONE
data.detailed_description:
*DO NOT BUY THIS GAME WITH IT'S CURRENT STATE - this game will be remade from scratch and it'll be free for a couple of weeks.

WarZone is a multiplayer First Person Shooter game .

It's about a unique world , different rules and a different style !
The main idea is that all players enjoy their time without having any weapon at the start of the game ... , but everything will change once you hear the alarm ... 8 players go through 4 gates !! ,just make sure to get your guns before the enemy does .

Warzone also contains a single-player mode , which is completely different , the single-player mode is set in a war-zone where two teams of robots fight , different difficulty levels , unlocking weapons , the team with more kills wins.

Features :


  • Character Customization
  • Flying
  • Gathering resources
  • Building

NOTE * : We recommend that you play the game with your friends .

The main idea is that all players enjoy their time without having any weapon at the start of the game ... , but everything will change once you hear the alarm ... 8 players go through 4 gates !! ,just make sure to get your guns before the enemy does .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 level Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ASUS radeon r7 240 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
